previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. Sporting Kansas City | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 3, Sporting KC 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution take on Sporting Kansas City at Gillette Stadium in a crucial Eastern Conference matchup.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs. Sporting Kansas City

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: We're underway @GilletteStadium as the #NERevs kick off a three-games-in-11-days homestand. First up, the defending champs. #NEvSKC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Lee Nguyen tries one from distance

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Crowd at kickoff for Jermaine Jones home debut. #NERevs #MLS http://t.co/gaaqKNzcvP

timelineItems.comment: Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Jason Weaver
timelineItems.text: Get in Soony! Lovely header. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Lindsey
timelineItems.text: #SKC!

timelineItems.name: Jhulan Banago
timelineItems.text: #SKC GOALLLL

timelineItems.name: Baldi-LOX
timelineItems.text: SOOOOOOONY!!! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Kyle
timelineItems.text: man i hate long throws #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dakota Okwuone
timelineItems.text: SOOONNYYY! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Chris Dolt
timelineItems.text: SOONY! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Missed mark by Bunbury. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Lucie Rogers
timelineItems.text: #skc off to a great start! Let's see if we can keep the lead ⚽️

timelineItems.name: Michael Borland
timelineItems.text: A lead! #skc

timelineItems.name: Jason Murray
timelineItems.text: JJ's first contribution for #NERevs lol

timelineItems.name: Nathan Verissimo
timelineItems.text: Not a great start to Jermaine Jones first MLS start. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 9' GOAL. Soony Saad heads home a long throw from Besler. #NERevs #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Adam McGee
timelineItems.text: Drives me nuts that @GEICO doesnt advertise at the 15min mark during soccer games. Just saw 1 at the 4min mark. #NERevs Am I alone on this?

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Darrius Barnes.

timelineItems.name: birdboy2000
timelineItems.text: So is it to soon to give up on this game? #NERevs #Wesuckatcomebacksthisyear

timelineItems.name: Boston_Sports
timelineItems.text: #NERevs give up the early goal, trail 1-0 10 min in.

timelineItems.name: Mike Amrock
timelineItems.text: The #NERevs have been trying to do that with the long throw for years...Damn! 0-1 bad guys.

timelineItems.name: Ed White
timelineItems.text: #NERevs arrgghhh. Nice head ball assist by Jones....for SKC. Revs down 0-1 10 minutes in.

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: DCU_Exile
timelineItems.text: So Jermaine Jones is a bit rusty. Woof. 1-0 to #SKC

timelineItems.name: a_sakowski
timelineItems.text: Whoever that new kid with the dreads is has to go. #NERevs #bringbennytoboston

timelineItems.name: Rob
timelineItems.text: If the last couple months of #NERevs games have taught me anything, this game is over and I can get on with my night.

timelineItems.name: Corey Heaward
timelineItems.text: I know it's a weekday and school night, but the attendance at Gillette is embarrassing. Wake up Kraft, a SSS is needed near Boston. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Charlie Davies with just two touches so far. #NERevs need to get him more involved tonight. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: The Revs are really trying to push the tempo in this game. Not sure if its working in their favor so far though #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Leadership from Goncalves, Jones and Nguyen will be important as the #NERevs look to recover

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Matt Besler.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 16' Sinovic cuts inside the box and fires a shot but its at Shuttleworth for the comfortable save. #NERevs #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 16' Sporting KC 1 #NERevs 0 Seth Sinovic cuts inside from the left and has a go with his right, but it's curled into the arms of @b_shuttle.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: #NERevs controlled the early portion of the game but SKC finding the gaps now

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jorge Claros (Sporting Kansas City).
José Gonçalves (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ed White
timelineItems.text: Is it just my angle or is the ref in the #NERevs vs #SKC game a giant?

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Mikey Lopez (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Jason Burak
timelineItems.text: This guy is having too much fun with Aaaaaa Jay a Jaaaayyyyy Jay y otra vez a Aaaaaaa Jay #NERevs

timelineItems.name: madisonroad
timelineItems.text: #NERevs Starting XI v #SKC: Shuttleworth; Barnes, Goncalves (c), Soares, Farrell; Jermaine Jones; Rowe, Nguyen, Kobayashi, Bunbury; Davies

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 2' Lee Nguyen forces a turnover and Daigo Kobayashi has a go from just over 20 yards out but its wide right. #NERevs #SportingKC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Teal Bunbury with an open look on net

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New England Revolution 3, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: Cathal Conlon
timelineItems.text: I told you! @LeeNguyen24 UNSTOPPABLE . Is he an All-Star now? #NERevs #MVP

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Nguyenner #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: FULL TIME: #SportingKC falls to the #NERevs 3-1 at Gillette Stadium. We're back at it Saturday evening vs @NewYorkRedBulls.

timelineItems.name: David Cain
timelineItems.text: Now we can be a little concerned, correct? Not panic, or dismay, but genuine concern seems reasonable. #SKC

timelineItems.name: The Great Bassby
timelineItems.text: 3 loses in a row? Smh #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Amy Casey
timelineItems.text: I may not have predicted @LeeNguyen24 would score twice BUT I did predict a 3-1 game with @LeeNguyen24 & @TealBunB scoring... #NERevs woohoo

timelineItems.name: Justin
timelineItems.text: Winning ways are here again?? Go #NERevs! Congrats on a great win!

timelineItems.name: Jim Brosnahan
timelineItems.text: So we do not sign attacking forwards 2 play a defensive style. Yet we cannot stop a soul. Time 4 changes! #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: krista ising
timelineItems.text: PV needs to pull a Bill Snyder and make the guys run until they learn a lesson after games like the last few. #SportingKC & why no Collin?!

timelineItems.name: Cliquon L'sticle
timelineItems.text: dear @J_Klinsmann have you ever met @LeeNguyen24 ??? give him a ring. 3-1 #revs #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Chip Cohlmia
timelineItems.text: #SKC outscored 9-2 in the last three games and the Royals leading the AL Central? I think this is a sign of the Apocalypse.

timelineItems.name: Nyghtewynd
timelineItems.text: Maybe using two DP spots on two guys already on the roster was not the best way to improve the team. Just saying. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Brendan Roche
timelineItems.text: 3 game Nguyenning Streak! #NERevs @LeeNguyen24 Man of the Streak!

timelineItems.name: Scott Armstrong
timelineItems.text: #SKC free fall. We are watching the season go down the tubes and it is depressing.

timelineItems.name: DCU_Exile
timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen's finishing is just amazing. Do not leave that man unmarked for a second. #SKCvNE #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: So... is it too late for Lee Nguyen to enter the Massachusetts governor race? He's a popular man right now in these parts #NERevs #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: FT #NERevs 3 Sporting KC 1 @LeeNguyen24 strikes twice after @TealBunB opens the scoring as the Revs win their third straight. Heating up.

timelineItems.name: Revs Citizen
timelineItems.text: .@LeeNguyen24, the best play the #NERevs have had since @TaylorTwellman.

timelineItems.name: Greg Coia
timelineItems.text: #SKC is just not very good anymore. Letting URI transfer, Nagamura out, no controlling defensive presence in midfield anymore is a killer.

timelineItems.name: AZEjayhawk
timelineItems.text: Defense wins championships...and loses them, too. There are no words to describe how awful we are playing. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Scott McCullough
timelineItems.text: There's gotta be some serious Best XI consideration for Lee Nguyen. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Fake Jay Heaps
timelineItems.text: All I do is win...or lose...it's the draws I have trouble with. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian Emigholz
timelineItems.text: Well I'm really not looking forward to school tomorrow...at all, but that was a huge win for @NERevolution 😲😲😲 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: DCU_Exile
timelineItems.text: With a 3rd consecutive loss, #SKC remains 4 points behind #DCU in the Eastern Conference. #vamosunited

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@LeeNguyen24 now with 12 goals. He had nine in his first two MLS seasons combined. http://t.co/FphaH7jaTM #NEvSKC http://t.co/61AFU1HEWW

timelineItems.name: Jim Brosnahan
timelineItems.text: Sapong, Soony, Claudio, Peterson are not starting MLS forwards. Make better transfer window moves pls @RobbHeineman #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Peter Elliott
timelineItems.text: @Urirosell This is all your fault. #skc #joking #sortof @KCCauldron

timelineItems.name: Michelle Watson
timelineItems.text: So if the #Royals and #SportingKC can't be good at the same time then the Royals had better make the playoffs!

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: THAT'S IT! 3-1, #NERevs and three straight wins. Thanks for coming out tonight. We'll see ya back at… http://t.co/eMaOUQB7Sn

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution take on Sporting Kansas City at Gillette Stadium in a crucial Eastern Conference matchup.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs. Sporting Kansas City | September 3, 2014

timelineItems.desc: Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Daigo Kobayashi gets booked for a bad challenge

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kelyn Rowe.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: #jermainejonesmustache #nerevs #mls

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Hey at least HIS was on target #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution).
Mikey Lopez (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Tom Quinlan
timelineItems.text: This is definitely not the team we saw Saturday. To paraphrase a #JJ quote "Its time to kick some people in the ass." #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Those surprised by #NERevs low attendance tonight, just a reality of a Sept weekday game when your fans are a younger demographic #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Good run by Bunbury, could've showed a little patience before taking that shot. Like them bring aggressive though #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 22' Kobayashi gets a yellow card after a harsh tackle on Mikey Lopez. #NERevs #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 22' Sporting KC 1 #NERevs 0 Yellow card issued to Daigo Kobayashi for a challenge on Mikey Lopez near midfield.

timelineItems.name: Melissa Kenny
timelineItems.text: At #NERevs match for first time since opener. Decided since Bob Kraft spent some cash I would too.

timelineItems.name: Gathan Nower
timelineItems.text: Mariner assesses that Kobayashi is a step or two off the game. Same could be said of everyone in an #NERevs shirt.

timelineItems.name: Bryce
timelineItems.text: @NERevolution Loving jones' mustache style. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Steven Stoehr
timelineItems.text: @RevsTV Have to disagree, Brad. Felt Sinovic always looked good for #NERevs. His release was puzzling at best.

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: On the plus side #NERevs have a heckuva bench tonight. Diego, Mullins, Neumann & Taylor all capable of providing a spark #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: Mo
timelineItems.text: I'm about to run on the field and punch Bunbury. How bad can you be? #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Victoria Masterson
timelineItems.text: "@NERevolution: Some guy named "Jones" in the #NERevs starting lineup tonight. Anybody heard of him?"

timelineItems.name: Mackenzie Manning
timelineItems.text: "To be fair we didn't get to see Sinovic's skills in his early years..." Yeah whatever New England announcer we all know you cut him. #skc

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | Arsenal
timelineItems.text: What a ball from @Jermainejunior. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Great defensive effort there by Farrell. SKC comes down 2-on-1 and he deflects the ball away and gets the Revs possession #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: #NERevs seemed to have caught TFC-itis in Toronto... 😞

timelineItems.name: pereira4785
timelineItems.text: #NERevs @WorcesterHerald 27' minute still 1-0 Kansas city

timelineItems.name: Erika Viviana
timelineItems.text: if it's not one baby daddy, it's another. way to go, @soonysaad 💙 #SKC

timelineItems.name: Tyler Silva
timelineItems.text: Love watching top quality football #NErevs #grandejogo @_sarahdesouza

timelineItems.comment: Foul by C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City).
Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: doug
timelineItems.text: YO, jermaine jones....could you be like 10 years younger? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 29' Yellow card for Bunbury. #NERevs #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: pereira4785
timelineItems.text: #NERevs attacking down Teal's side, but hes not getting quality crosses in

timelineItems.comment: Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Diago takes the first shot of the night for the Revs. Wide of the net but Revs attacking early #NERevs

timelineItems.name: madisonroad
timelineItems.text: #NERevs bench: Knighton, Smith, Neumann, Fagundez, Taylor, Alston, Mullins

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Soony Saad.

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Saturday should be good. But holy crap, this crowd. Wednesday or not… #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Lauren Braastad
timelineItems.text: Take a shot every time an unnecessary card is given #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Getting testy quick. #SKC #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: This game is starting to get pretty physical. Especially on that Bunbury challenge #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matthew Minton
timelineItems.text: Outrageous Yellow on Bunbury there. Eye for an eye, IMO. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 29' Sporting KC 1 #NERevs 0 @TealBunB sees yellow for a challenge on Sinovic, who was simply warned for a similar challenge minutes ago.

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: That was foolish by Teal, retaliation will always get you a yellow. #NERevs #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sara Jean
timelineItems.text: I can't imagine being @Jermainejunior and playing #GER only to now be playing #SKC in the @MLS at a barely filled #NERevs stadium....

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Still just four touches for Charlie Davies tonight. Not a good sign for a trailing team. #NERevs #NEvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Devin Pleuler
timelineItems.text: Somebody tell Teal Bunbury (6'2") not to cross the ball into a box full of Nguyen (5'8"), Rowe (5'8") and Davies (5'10"). #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Charlie
timelineItems.text: Wish I didn't have a night class so I could watch the @SportingKC #SKC

timelineItems.name: Craig Forde
timelineItems.text: #NERevs passing game is lacking terribly right now, having trouble building up anything forward #MLS #SKC

timelineItems.name: a_sakowski
timelineItems.text: Vermes understands the quality of the #MLS refs and trains his players to work the refs perfectly. #SKC #NERevs #NEvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Soony Saad (Sporting Kansas City).
Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: #NERevs: 2, 3 passes, concede possession, struggle for five minutes, repeat.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Teal Bunbury has completed 3 of 7 passes (43%) thus far, worst on the team. Jones first at 18 of 20 (90%). #NERevs #NEvSKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: @NAGower this #NERevs squad can and should be at LEAST as good as this depleted SKC.

timelineItems.name: Rick A. Barry
timelineItems.text: @Jermainejunior looking like captain jack sparrow with that goatee game #revs #NERevs #pirate

timelineItems.name: Adam M
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile #NERevs need to pick it up. Haven't been great at holding possession today

timelineItems.name: Michael Borland
timelineItems.text: Feel like Collin being dropped has sent a message to the rest of the team. Something like 'work your ass off or I'll break you in two' #skc

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: American Soccer Fan
timelineItems.text: "Turn-about should be equally adjudicated." Revs announcer with the hot hot Thesaurus action. #SKC #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mikey Lopez (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: papii_nice_guyyyy
timelineItems.text: Keyln rowes corners are not good #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Engdoll
timelineItems.text: Well at least the tickets are free. At this point I would never pay to come to a #NERevs game. Terrible soccer right now. You have J.Jones!!

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Lopez is not enjoying this game. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Craig Forde
timelineItems.text: This #SKC side is very frisky and not afraid to get their hands up high on guys #MLS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 35' Yellow card for Sporting KC's Mikey Lopez. Pulled down Kobayashi in the run of play. #NERevs #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 35' Sporting KC 1 #NERevs 0 Yellow issued to Mikey Lopez for hauling down Daigo 25 yards out. Dangerous free kick upcoming ...

timelineItems.text: 35' Sporting KC 1 #NERevs 0 Corner is partially cleared but it falls to @LeeNguyen24, who forces a good save out of Gruenebaum.

timelineItems.name: Just Ceching
timelineItems.text: Lopez will see red. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: So SKC CAN earn a yellow in this game....#NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Farrell is having another rough game #NERevs #SKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: The Mongoose
timelineItems.text: Annnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnd #NERevs

timelineItems.name: pereira4785
timelineItems.text: @WorcesterHerald #NERevs Nguyen to take free kick, and kicks it at wall

timelineItems.comment: Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: A.J. Soares with a solid defensive effort there. Wins the header then wins the tackle within a few seconds #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Bunbury showing way too much of the ball, Sinovic is owning him tonight #SKC #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 39' Yellow to Seth Sinovic. Took down Bunbury. #NERevs #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #NERevs with 50.3% possession thus far, outpossessing #SportingKC who lead the #MLS in average possession. Haven't done much with it though.

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Bunbury's first touch is AWFUL. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: #SKC gives Rowe the chance to cut inside, first mistake of the night. #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: クソコテbot
timelineItems.text: 俺も昔自殺を考えて死に場所を探してたけど 田舎すぎて飛び降りられそうなビルが無かった(配信はまだかお(´ω｀)) #SKC #kusokote

timelineItems.name: Bart Ewing
timelineItems.text: Worried about midfield battle #nervskc #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Daigo Kobayashi tries a through ball, but Kelyn Rowe is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: And YOU get a yellow card, and YOU get a yellow card #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Craig Forde
timelineItems.text: The ref is certainly making his money, and getting his face time in with this one #SKC #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: Rob McNicholas
timelineItems.text: Despite everyone looking a step slow, tonight feels like the night Farrell gets to shave that beard... #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mario Moretto
timelineItems.text: Is it just me or has Jones been giving the international symbol for "I'm open!" a lot in this game? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: a_sakowski
timelineItems.text: And now the ref realizes that when you let violence occur early, things get violent. #ThereWillBeRed #NERevs #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: This may be one of those games where we talk about refereeing at the end #NERevs #SKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Richard Jaffa
timelineItems.text: #NERevs haven't really threatened Gruenebaum's goal since they went a goal down early on

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: Dammit...now the #NERevs and #Belize are losing 0-1...

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Lee Nguyen tries a through ball, but Teal Bunbury is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Jones and Nguyen linking up in the midfield, thing of beauty #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: This game needs some Fagundez and Alston. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 1, Sporting Kansas City 1. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the right side of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Teal Bunbury draws it level with the help of a fortunate deflection

timelineItems.name: Gathan Nower
timelineItems.text: Teal the worst #NERevs man on the pitch. Farrell the best. Entire attacking unit needs a significant jump in their play.

timelineItems.name: Adam M
timelineItems.text: BUNBURY SCORED AGAIN #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: That's the type of goal that the #NEREVS needed. Doesn't matter how the goal goes in

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 45' GOAL. Teal Bunbury finally beats Sinovic and fires a shot that is deflected in. 1-1. #NERevs #SportingKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: TEAL! (Or own goal!) #NERevs

timelineItems.name: SNE & NYC Wx/News
timelineItems.text: GOAL! @TealBunB scores to equalize just before halftime. 1-1 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jason Weaver
timelineItems.text: Deflection. And Teal scores. Goodness me... #SKC

timelineItems.name: Mo
timelineItems.text: Teal still awful. So lucky #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Bunbury gets a lucky bounce, shooting has been way off tonight, still might have gone in though. #NERevs #SKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Bunbury hits it off Besler and finds the back of the net and were tied at 1-1 right before the half. Revs needed that big time #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Jones a huge part of the goal. Also, Besler #NEREVS

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: TEAL!!! We're level, and it's @TealBunB punishing his former team once again! Deflected shot beat Gruenebaum at the near post. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Adam M
timelineItems.text: Jones with his first assist with the #NERevs!

timelineItems.name: Paulo S.
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL de NEW England Revolution! #NERevs @UnivisionSports @raulguzman

timelineItems.name: JT Chang
timelineItems.text: Teal just owned Sinovic. The deserved YC played a part there. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Carl Setterlund
timelineItems.text: Muskets fired! #NERevs are back in it thanks to some relentless play by Teal Bunbury. 1-1 now. Jermaine Jones debut not spoiled yet #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | Arsenal
timelineItems.text: Get in! @TealBunB levels it after a fantastic switch from @Jermainejunior. Massive just before half. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Mike Amrock
timelineItems.text: Nothing better than a stoppage time goal. Well done @TealBunB #NERevs 1-1

timelineItems.name: Nelson Vasconcelos
timelineItems.text: A little luck but the #NERevs earned it after the last 20 minutes or so.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Jacobs
timelineItems.text: Calm down Seth. Just get to the locker room. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones gets the assist on the Bunbury goal. His first assist as a member of the Revs #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Thomas Caito
timelineItems.text: Doesn't look like Sinovic can touch a #NERevs player without getting a foul. #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: John Stephens
timelineItems.text: Teal Bunbury makes it 1-1 scoring against his old side, what an assist from Jones. #NERevs back level

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Thats the half. Revs struggle through a lot of that half but break through in the 45th minute. 1-1 at the half #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Will Northrup
timelineItems.text: Nice goal. Teal and Charlie seem to have an understanding. A good sign for the rest of the season. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Lawrence Olum.
First Half ends, New England Revolution 1, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: HT: New England 1, Sporting KC 1. #NERevs #SportingKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Alex
timelineItems.text: #SKC was under near constant pressure for past 25 minutes. #SKCvNE

timelineItems.name: Jeremy
timelineItems.text: Nice to see that Jones assist too. Decent ending to the half!! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Adam M
timelineItems.text: Big goal to end the half. Jones was looking gassed out there. Wondering if that's it for him tonight. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kian Murphy
timelineItems.text: Proposing a new @TealBunB hashtag... #ThankYouTeal #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #NERevs crowd filled in a bit as the half wore on. #NEvSKC #MLS http://t.co/h0r6YLwuq2

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: Stay tuned. Second half should be VERY interesting. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Juan Carlos
timelineItems.text: Teal, you backstabber!! #dammitteal #SKC

timelineItems.name: Joseph Fergus Curran
timelineItems.text: Is this 1994, because everything's coming up Tall. #NERevsGame #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Who on the bench comes on for Jones? I say get Fagundez out there, push Rowe central, let Daigo and Nguyen playtoon that CDM role. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Odds on a second yellow/red? #NERevs #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Charlie Davies finished the half with just 6 touches. Bunbury at 42% passing accuracy (5 of 12), Rowe 45% (9 for 20). #NERevs #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: Justin Anderson
timelineItems.text: @NERevolution first half a bit chippy- 2 yellows per side. But knotted at 1. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Fountain City Ultras
timelineItems.text: Uhh, we sold him, how is he a backstabber? RT @JuanPlusCarlos: Teal, you backstabber!! #dammitteal #SKC

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Jones leads all players with 87% passing accuracy at half time (27 of 31). Has 2 interceptions, tackle, assist, foul & foul suffered #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Joe Eckstrom
timelineItems.text: @Jermainejunior can be the Stevie G of @MLS pinging 60 yard passes all over the park #Nerevs

timelineItems.name: Kevin
timelineItems.text: Ahhh how I love the #DamnitTeal hashtag #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mario Moretto

timelineItems.name: AmericaSoccerProject
timelineItems.text: The reason why #NERevs need to score more at home. http://t.co/A0XUjJmufI

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: #SKC is 2-0 when @SoonySaad has scored this year. The Revs are 3-0 when Bunbury has scored in 2014. Something's gotta give in the 2nd half.

timelineItems.name: Max Fischer
timelineItems.text: SKC giving bunbury space to lure the pass, knowing he's awful on the ball & worse at finishing (deflection goal). Ready for Diego. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Adam M
timelineItems.text: Wish I was at Gillette for JJJ's home debut for the #NERevs. Hopefully there's a good crowd there tonight!

timelineItems.name: Andy Martinez
timelineItems.text: I have meetings to be at, but this #SKC game is about to start! 😩

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: And @jermainejunior makes his debut. #nerevs #netid @ Gillette Stadium http://t.co/rQ9MJxjQGt

timelineItems.name: Adam Hart
timelineItems.text: Supporters in The Fort holding eight letters reading: JERMAINE. I counted. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brian Calhoun
timelineItems.text: @NERevolution Lining up for a big match vs @SportingKC with our new star @Jermainejunior #NERevs http://t.co/Rg7hQqCdxs

timelineItems.name: Prairie Rose Clayton
timelineItems.text: Damn I love it when the random-ass season ticket holder anthem singer is opera trained #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Wyatt Campbell
timelineItems.text: @Jermainejunior is at this home opener wondering where everyone is at 😂 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Halftime sub: Steve Neumann places Jermaine Jones. #NERevs #SportingKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: Good home debut by Jones despite the mistake on the SKC goal. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: megan.

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 2, Sporting Kansas City 1. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner.

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | Arsenal
timelineItems.text: .@LeeNguyen24!!! MVP!!! What a player. #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Nguyen curls his shot into the far corner and #NERevs grab a 2-1 lead in the 48th minute #NEvSKC http://t.co/IIno8D8Ypd

timelineItems.name: JT Chang
timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen is magic. MAGIC. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: Becoming more and more laughable that Lee wasn't an All-Star! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Cathal Conlon
timelineItems.text: He just cannot be stopped. @LeeNguyen24 cannot be stopped. Is he an All Star yet? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Rob McDougall
timelineItems.text: Kraft panicking, trying to get @thesoccerdon & @ChicagoFire on the phone 😂 RT @Hisco5: Where is everybody ? #NERevs http://t.co/5U9OWU3KpK

timelineItems.name: Jeremy
timelineItems.text: Bummed I didn't make it out to Gillette Stadium for the #NERevs but I'm watching at home a staked to see @Jermainejunior in starting 11 #MLS

timelineItems.text: The #NERevs opening up space early over SKC. Looks good early.

timelineItems.text: #NERevs in Univision they pronounce Lee's name as enn goo yen

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: birdboy2000
timelineItems.text: A midfielder who scores like a forward. Lee's got a case for MVP - glad we're #Nguyenning now. #NERevs.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Lawrence Olum tries a through ball, but C.J. Sapong is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Great square pass from @Krowe210 to find @LeeNguyen24 at the top of the box. Given a yard of space to shoot. You know the rest. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: M

timelineItems.name: Matthew Minton
timelineItems.text: BEAM ME UP SCOTTTTTTTTYYYYYYYYYY. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kian Murphy
timelineItems.text: #NERevs Lee Nguyen there's no reason that name shouldn't go down as a club legend in the Rev history book.

timelineItems.name: Kyle
timelineItems.text: #NERevs coming out from the half strong is just what i want to see

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Two sublime touches by Lee Nguyen to place #NERevs in front. #MLS

timelineItems.text: HEY #SKC IF I PROMISE TO NEVER GO TO ANOTHER GAME AGAIN CAN YOU GUYS BE REALLY GOOD AGAIN PLS.

timelineItems.text: Dirty ball in, dirty shot. @Krowe210 to @LeeNguyen24. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mario Moretto

timelineItems.name: Miles Halpine
timelineItems.text: Wow. @LeeNguyen24 with the game-changer! #NERevs #NEvSKC #Nguyening

timelineItems.text: Lee Nguyen is two goals away from tying Fagundez's team-leading goals in 2013. He has already equaled Sene's tally in 2012 #NEREVS

timelineItems.text: If i'm Nguyen, I go back to Europe one more time. No need to get lowballed in #MLS. Going to get his #USMNT look. #NERevs

timelineItems.text: That's Lee Nguyen's 11th goal of the season, what a year he's having. Surely would've been an AllStar if it weren't for that #NERevs slump.

timelineItems.text: 84' #NERevs 2 Sporting KC 1 Yellows issued to Graham Zusi and @Krowe210. Kelyn pulled back Zusi, who responded with a shove.

timelineItems.text: Zus mad #sportingkc

timelineItems.text: 85' #NERevs 2 Sporting KC 1 Final @SearsAuto substitution for the Revs sees @DiegoFagundez14 enter the game for @Krowe210.

timelineItems.text: I don't think I've ever seen Zusi this pissed. Love that (earned and deserved) foul. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Chip Cohlmia
timelineItems.text: WHAT DID I JUST SAY (tweet).....? #SKC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Andy Gruenebaum stretches out to deny Patrick Mullins

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Zusi is extremely frustrated right now, Rowe was all over him though #SKC #NERevs #MLS

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: If Zusi isn't Zusi that's red. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jalexis Sanchez
timelineItems.text: Going to read bedtime books....turn this one around for me, would ya #SKC?

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Sporting have to keep heads, or risk going into NJ1 game with someone suspended.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Well, #SportingKC still fighting...almost literally...

timelineItems.name: Jim Brosnahan
timelineItems.text: SportingKC needs creative, forwards with speed. Dom is a keeper but all the rest can go. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Andy Gruenebaum.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Tonight's home attendance (11,707) is the second worst of the season for #NERevs. Mothers' Day game v. Seattle (11,293) was worst. #NEvSKC

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 87' Mullins with a rip from distance, forcing Gruenebaum into a diving save. #NERevs #MLS #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 87' #NERevs 2 Sporting KC 1 Great work from @p_mullins_7 to settle, turn and shoot from distance. Forces great diving save from Gruenebaum.

timelineItems.name: Brandon Barelmann
timelineItems.text: I cant believe I'm saying this, but #SportingKC looks tired. We GOTTA hurry.

timelineItems.name: AZEjayhawk
timelineItems.text: Who else is shouting, "What are you doing?!" This is insane. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: izzy bacon
timelineItems.text: @NERevolution DIEGO IS IN...I REPEAT DIEGO IS IN!!! I LOVE YOU #NERevs #ilovediego

timelineItems.name: Jim Brosnahan
timelineItems.text: SportingKC has too much difficulty playing from behind as they lack attacking players with pace #SportingKC @JamesStarritt @downthebyline

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: I would really like one more goal for the #NERevs. Please.

timelineItems.text: @2Fast2Farrell has had an excellent game. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: I am (not) Zlatan
timelineItems.text: This feels like 2012 era offense. But without the speed and athleticism. #SKC

timelineItems.text: Stoppage time approaching. Heart beats increasing... #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Erin Goldberg
timelineItems.text: @NErebellion @MidnightRiders watching the game at home and the FORT is loud!!!!!!!! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Michael J. Lunsford
timelineItems.text: This team gives me the highest highs and the lowest of lows. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: We're into four minutes of stoppage time as the #NERevs look to hold onto a 2-1 lead over Sporting KC.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by José Gonçalves (New England Revolution).
Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Joey
timelineItems.text: We used to win games. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Rob McNicholas
timelineItems.text: And @RevsTV just jinxed it. @BFeld67 is buying post game beers if this goes south #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: If the #NERevs don't win this game, I'm blaming the graphics guy @CSNNE.

timelineItems.name: Andy Olson
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC has really taken a turn for the worse the past few weeks #getittogether

timelineItems.name: Anthony Jennings
timelineItems.text: Nguyen is getting swarmed on every touch and still managing to get his passes away. Having an incredible season #Nguyenning #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Martin Steuble.
Attempt missed. Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Matt Terrill
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC doing their best impression of Montréal 2013. This is getting pretty ugly to watch. Absolutely no threat this half.

timelineItems.name: Red Lyon Tavern
timelineItems.text: Goodness. We've got some work to do. #SportingKC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 3, Sporting Kansas City 1. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Lee Nguyen rifles one hard and low to the far post

timelineItems.comment: A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: @BFeld67 doing his darnedest to prevent Paul Mariner from jinxing the #NERevs in stoppage time.

timelineItems.text: Dear @whitecapsfc, Not a day goes by when we don't appreciate your generosity in giving us @LeeNguyen24. Signed, #NERevs supporters

timelineItems.text: Losing in front of tens of people #skc, goddamnit

timelineItems.text: Nguyen is just fantastic #NERevs 3-1 over #SKC

timelineItems.text: NGUYENNER! #NERevs

timelineItems.text: Three Points! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 90+' GOAL! Nguyen gets his brace after blocking a clearance down to Mullins and getting the pass back. #NERevs #MLS #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Nguyen again. 3-1 Revs. #SportingKC allows three goals for the third straight match.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New England Revolution 3, Sporting Kansas City 1.
